title: How should I revise the 11th syllabus in 4 months at the end of my class 11? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey reader Try out the following In month of December revise your following topicsTrigonometryStraight lineCONIC SECTIONFunctionsIn month of January revise themArthematic progressionGeometric progressionInductionProbalityStatsComplex numbers.In month of February.Only few topics are left . These can be revised easily. Practice previous years paper. And do keep a record of application based question. DIFFERENTIAL calculus .is very important. Practice it thoroughly. Hope it helps.
